response.original_title: Zebrahead - Blood, Sweat & Beers!!! - Live In Tokyo Japan
response.overview: Californian punk rockers Zebrahead perform live in Tokyo in August 2004.  It's been a while since we last heard from Zebrahead, but the Orange County, California-based band is making their presence felt once again with Blood Sweat & Beers a live DVD shot in Tokyo as the band toured their highly successful "MFZB" album (GOLF, 2004). Revitalized, road-tightened and eager to redefine their focus, the quintet comes out swinging, delivering a flurry of pummeling rhythms, clench-fisted chords and meaty hooks that connect with each listen. Razor-sharp rockers like "Rescue Me" & crowd pleasing favorites like "Playmate Of The Year" are all on show here as well as songs from all of the bands albums as they perform for a rabid audience. This DVD shows all the electrifying energy of a live Zebrahead show, blending raging tempos and ringing guitar lines into surging, insistent choruses that stick after a single listen.
response.title: Zebrahead - Blood, Sweat & Beers!!! - Live In Tokyo Japan
